summary: Allows you to create forsworn weapons at forge.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=\"5\"]Craftable Forsworn weapons ![/size][/b][/center]


[b]> Description[/b]

Allows you to create forsworn weapons at forge.
You will need the perk \"Orcish Smithing \" for create the weapons and arrows forsworn.
It\'s in the Hide section.

I changed the stats of the arrows to make them useful, they have (with this mod) the same stats as the orcish arrows (see screenshot).


---== RECIPES ==--- 
[list]
[*][b]Forsworn Axe (11dmg)[/b] : 2 Firewood / 1 Bear Claw / 1 Steel Ingot / 2 Leather Strip
[*][b]Forsworn Bow (12dmg)[/b] : 2 Firewood / 1 Bear Claw / 2 Leather Strip
[*][b]Forsworn Sword (10dmg)[/b] : 1 Firewood / 1 Horker Tusk / 2 Leather Strip
[*][b]Forsworn Arrow (12dmg)[/b] (50) : 5 Firewood / 2 small Antlers
[/list]

===========================================================
v1.0c
Initial Release

===========================================================

[b]> Installation[/b]

Put the *.esp file in your Data folder, don\'t forget to enable it.


[b]> Uninstallation[/b]

Delete the *.esp file.

===========================================================

[b]> My other mods[/b]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=889]Craftable Tools & Lokcpick[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1555]Iron & Steel Arrows Leopard[/url]

===========================================================

Enjoy !


~Leezi
author: Leezi
